Html:
There is any option to put a textbox on the chartplotter? Because textbox isn't child of Chartplotter. So is there any other way to put a text on the chart ? I have a line and i want to write in the middle the length. How can I do it ? (I have the length, I just want to know how to put a vertical text).
Thanks in advice, Ben.

Yes,

Just add chartplotter.Children.Add(textbox);
not only just text box you can add any control to this.

Regards
Ravi.
